attributes.action: Ask the Scottish Parlament to block BREXIT and save England from itself.
attributes.background: The Scottish Parlament may have the power to stop BREXIT. If there is any chance of doing this, it has a moral obligation to save the future of our children and grandchildren.

rejection.details:
The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:


http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
